name: Staggered Push-ups
setup: Start in push-up position with one hand forward, one back
Forward hand aligned with head, back hand by mid-chest
Maintain straight line from head to heels
Engage core and glutes for stability
steps: Lower chest toward floor with controlled descent
Keep even weight distribution between hands
Descend until chest nearly touches floor
Press through both palms to return to start
Complete set, then switch hand positions
cues: One hand high, one low position
mistakes: Shifting too much weight to one side
safety: Focus on equal weight distribution. If one side feels strained, adjust hand positioning or regress movement.

prescriptionHints.notes: More challenging than standard push-ups due to unilateral demand

joints.notes: Requires good core stability. Monitor wrist comfort with hand positioning.
